config.name: SobiPro
config.description:
SobiPro can be used by administrators to restrict the listings and featured listings published by actively subscribed users.

Reference Link:Sobi Pro
config.help:
If you made any changes in App parameters then those changes will not be applicable to those users who are already using that functionality.
For eg. If you change No. of allowed entries from 2 to 5 then it will not be applied to those who has already subscribed to the plan attached with this app.
